content: प्रणयिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Loving, affectionate, kind, attached; <ls>Māl. 3. 9</ls>; <ls n="Māl.">6. 30.</ls> {@--2@} Beloved, dearly loved. {@--3@} Desirous of, longing for, fondly solicitous of; अंकाश्रयप्रणयिनस्तनयान्वहंतः <ls>Ś. 7. 17</ls>; <ls>Me. 3</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 55</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 3.</ls> {@--4@} Familiar, intimate. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A friend, companion, favourite; <ls>Ku. 5. 11.</ls> {@--2@} A husband, lover. {@--3@} A supplicant, humble petitioner, suitor; स्वार्थात् सतां गुरुतरा प्रणयिक्रियैव <ls>V. 4. 15</ls>; <ls n="V.">1. 2.</ls> {@--4@} A worshipper; devotee; <ls>Ku. 3. 66.</ls> --नी {@--1@} A mistress, beloved, wife. {@--2@} A female friend.
